en.title: [2024] Household Expenditure
en.description: Latest data on household expenditure, disaggregated by expenditure category, at national, state, and district level.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest data on household expenditure, disaggregated by expenditure category at national, state, and district level.

bm.title: [2024] Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah
bm.description: Data terkini merangkumi perbelanjaan isi rumah mengikut kumpulan perbelanjaan di peringkat nasional, negeri, dan daerah.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data terkini perbelanjaan isi rumah, merangkumi perbelanjaan isi rumah mengikut kumpulan perbelanjaan di peringkat nasional, negeri, dan daerah.
